izzy.misc.ArrayLike¶

class izzy.misc.ArrayLike(data)[source]¶

Something that is ArrayLike is anything that can be coerced into a numpy.ndarray(). This includes lists, tuples, sets, pandas.Series(), pandas.DataFrame(), etc.

Note: this class is not implemented. Don’t create an instance, because it doesn’t do anything.

classmethod register(subclass)[source]¶

Registers a new subclass as ArrayLike

Parameters

subclass (class) – Subclass to register as ArrayLike
